name: 16 (hohohogames)
description:
16 is a EXTREMELY ADDICTIVE and FUN GAME which can train your visual perception, attention and motor skills.

Challenge and exercise your mind in a fun way!

How To Play:

Tap from 1 to 16 as fast as you can and beat other players record.

Features:

- 8 different graphic styles

- 3 different game mode

- Simple beautiful graphics

- Easy to play, Hard to master

- Challenge your reaction

- Help improving your cognitive function

- Get addicted right away
